ModMetaData.name: Blocky Logs
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description: Blocky Logs Wood types & colors from Minecraft: - Acacia - Bamboo - Birch - Dark oak - Jungle - Mangrove - Oak - Spruce Matches best with Blocky Trees, but not necessarily. If any mod add trees with matching names, their wood type will be changed. If Expanded Woodworking is active then corresponding lumber types are also added, along with Minecraft planks texture. Verified compatible/supported mods • Blocky Trees • Expanded Woodworking • Extended Woodworking • Advanced Biomes (Continued) https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-BlockyLogs Support me https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5 or https://www.patreon.com/zed_0xff
